name: marketdope/landing-nobuild
title: MarketDope Landing (No-Build)
description: Editable landing page block (hero, services, audience, why-us, testimonial, final CTA). No CLI required.

subheadline.default: Stop drowning in manual tasks. Automate your workflows, unlock smarter trading insights, and grow your business while you sleep.

default.title: AI Workflow Automation
default.desc: Transform your repetitive tasks into smart, automated systems. From client onboarding to trade analysis, let AI handle the grunt work so you can focus on strategy and growth.

default.title: Data Dashboards That Actually Matter
default.desc: See everything that matters in one place. Track clients, trades, revenue, and performance metrics with dashboards designed for real-world decision making, not just pretty charts.

default.title: Trading Automation Kit
default.desc: Level up your trading game with pro-level tools that work for solo traders. Get automated alerts, risk management, and performance tracking without the enterprise price tag.

default.title: Customer Discovery Kit
default.desc: Stop guessing what your market wants. Our proven system helps you validate ideas, find paying clients, and build products people actually need before you waste time building.

default.title: Day Traders
default.desc: You're tired of staring at screens all day and missing opportunities. Our automation handles the monitoring, alerts, and analysis so you can execute with confidence and actually have a life.

default.title: Freelancers & Solopreneurs
default.desc: Juggling clients, invoices, projects, and growth feels impossible. We build systems that manage the chaos so you can focus on delivering great work and scaling your business.

default.title: Small Teams
default.desc: You need enterprise-level efficiency without enterprise complexity. Our streamlined solutions keep everyone aligned and productive without drowning in tools and processes.

default.title: Results Today, Not Tomorrow
default.desc: No 6-month implementation timelines. We build practical automation that saves you time from day one, not theoretical solutions that might work someday.

default.title: Plain English, Zero Jargon
default.desc: We speak human, not tech-bro. Clear explanations, honest timelines, and straightforward solutions. No buzzwords, no hype, just stuff that works.

default.title: Battle-Tested in the Trenches
default.desc: These aren't academic theories. Every system we build has been tested in real trading environments and actual businesses. We know what works because we've done it ourselves.

secondaryCtaText.default: Ready to Get Your Time Back? Let's Build Your System

testimonialText.default: "I went from spending 4 hours a day on admin work to 30 minutes. The trading automation caught 3 opportunities I would have completely missed while I was in client calls. This literally paid for itself in the first week."

finalTitle.default: Ready to Work Smarter, Not Harder?

finalText.default: MarketDope is your AI co-founder. Let's build the system that frees you to focus on growth instead of busy work.

finalSub.default: 30-minute call • No sales pitch • Just real solutions
